==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
[[秋]] ([[autumn]]) + [[水]] ([[water]]s)
: The waters of autumn are clear and pure. This term is used metaphorically to describe an object (ex. shiny metal etc) with this quality.
